## Description {#details}

Promotes private symbols to global hidden, and renames to prevent clashes with other promoted symbols.

The same SymbolPromoter instance should be used for all symbols to be added to a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a>.

Definition at line 511 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/indirectionutils-h">IndirectionUtils.h</a>.

Promote symbols in the given module.

Returns the set of global values that have been renamed/promoted.
